    • Method Detail

      • pad

        public final byte[] pad(byte[] value,
         int maxLength,
         org.plasma.sdo.DataFlavor dataFlavor)
        Returns an array front padded with zeros or rear padded with spaces depending on the given data flavor. Returns the given array as is if the given array size is less than or equal to the given max length.
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        maxLength - the maximum length of the target key field
        dataFlavor - the data flavor
        Returns:
        an array front padded with zeros or rear padded with spaces depending on the given data flavor. Returns the given array as is if the given array size is less than or equal to the given max length.

           int maxLength,

        public final java.lang.String pad(java.lang.String value,
                   int maxLength,
                   org.plasma.sdo.DataFlavor dataFlavor)
        Returns an array front padded with zeros or rear padded with spaces depending on the given data flavor.
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        maxLength - the maximum length of the target key field
        dataFlavor - the data flavor
        Returns:
        an array front padded with zeros or rear padded with spaces depending on the given data flavor.
